entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 February 2023
